T02TD3436E:93b-1: shr'i tree lo kya ba sham ka ra a'arya bhugma s'a dha nam /
T02TD3436E:93b-3: dpal 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed pa 'phags pa bhugma'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3436E:93b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3436E:93b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub sdig pa dang bral ba //
T02TD3436E:93b-6: bde gshegs sras dang rgyal ba'i yab nyid dang //
T02TD3436E:93b-7: 'gro mgon 'jig rten mnan rnams phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD3436E:93b-8: ngo mtshar can gyi sgrub thabs bshad par bya //
T02TD3436E:93b-9: snying gar aa yig las skyes zla ba chu skyes zla ba yid kyi mun 'joms pa'i //
T02TD3436E:93b-10: hr'i:yig 'od zer dra ba'i tshogs 'phro chu skyes dmar po skya rengs mdog lta bu //
T02TD3436E:93b-11: rnam thar gsum po yang dag bsam zhing mkhas pas gzugs ni dri med zhal sogs bsang //
T02TD3436E:93b-12: khro las rgyal bas dang por gnas dang bdag nyid bsrung ba'i sbyor ba nyid byas te //
T02TD3436E:93b-13: chang dang gur gum bzang po'i lde gus byugs //
T02TD3436E:93b-14: me tog dri bzangs rab byed gcal du bkram //
T02TD3436E:93b-15: bsam gtan gnas ni rab dgar bde ba'i stan //
T02TD3436E:93b-16: mthon po la ni rab tu 'dug byas te //
T02TD3436E:93b-17: gur gum tsandan dmar pos de mdun du //
T02TD3436E:93b-18: mandal shin tu zlum byas legs par byugs //
T02TD3436E:93b-19: me tog dmar po so ma gcal du bkram //
T02TD3436E:93b-20: rang gi sngags bzlas mchod yon dam pa'i snod //
T02TD3436E:93b-21: de nas nam mkhar rgyal sras kun bltas nas //
T02TD3436E:93b-22: mkhas pas gcig tu 'gro kun skrag bcas gdon pa'i phyir //
T02TD3436E:93b-23: mchod pa'i cho ga rnam mang rang gi sa bon bskyed //
T02TD3436E:93b-24: de rnams blo gros ldan pas mnyam gzhag yid kyis bya //
T02TD3436E:93b-25: de nas de rnams kyi mdun du pus mo sa la btsugs shing btud nas 'dug ste /
T02TD3436E:93b-26: thal mo sbyar nas bdag nyid lhag par grol ba'i phyir sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD3436E:93b-27: skrag pas sdig pa ma lus bshags bgyid cing //
T02TD3436E:93b-28: ma lus sdig la dga' bar mi bgyid do //
T02TD3436E:94a-1: kun la rjes su yi rang zhing //
T02TD3436E:94a-2: byang chub mchog tu bdag gis yongs su bsngo //
T02TD3436E:94a-3: dpung gnyen dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02TD3436E:94a-4: sangs rgyas rnams la bdag gis lus 'di 'bul //
T02TD3436E:94a-5: 'gro la phan bgyid byang chub snying po bzung //
T02TD3436E:94a-6: sangs rgyas phun tshogs gnas la yang dag bsten //
T02TD3436E:94a-7: 'gro ba mtha' dag sdug bsngal gyis mnar yang dag blta //
T02TD3436E:94a-8: sngags pas de la brtse chen 'od zer bsgom bya ste //
T02TD3436E:94a-9: bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus gnyis med stong par bsgom //
T02TD3436E:94a-10: kun la phan par yang ni rab tu blta bar bya //
T02TD3436E:94a-11: de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho&amp ;
T02TD3436E:94a-13: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko&amp ;
T02TD3436E:94a-14: ham zhes pa 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD3436E:94a-15: de nas mdun du 'od zer dra ba 'phro ba yi //
T02TD3436E:94a-16: p'a la sha yi me tog lta bu'i hr'i:yig bsam //
T02TD3436E:94a-17: des byung zla ba gang ba'i gzugs bltas la ;
T02TD3436E:94a-18: / hr'i:yig 'od zer dra ba'i 'od kyi dbus //
T02TD3436E:94a-19: de steng hr'i:yig las byung nyi ma ste //
T02TD3436E:94a-20: 'od kyis phyogs rnams kun tu snang byed cing //
T02TD3436E:94a-21: dbus nas hr'i:yig las byung 'od zer 'bar //
T02TD3436E:94a-22: mun pa mtha' dag 'joms byed yang dag bsam //
T02TD3436E:94a-23: de steng rang gi sa bon las skyes pa'i //
T02TD3436E:94a-24: 'dam skyes rnam rgyas nyi ma'i kha dog bzhin //
T02TD3436E:94a-25: yi ge hr'i:yis rab mdzes dbus ma'i cha //
T02TD3436E:94a-26: mkhas pas yid kyi mun 'joms rnam par bsam byas la //
T02TD3436E:94a-27: de nas rang gi sa bon ma lus pa las ni //
T02TD3436E:94a-28: thub dbang spro dang de las bsdu byas nas //
T02TD3436E:94a-29: sa bon gyis mtshan nyi zla'i thig les bskyed //
T02TD3436E:94a-30: 'gro ba'i mgon du bdag nyid blta bar bya //
T02TD3436E:94a-31: padma dang ni zla ba'i steng na rol zhing mnyam pa'i zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD3436E:94a-32: 'khrul pa rab bcom padma rgyas pa'i zhal mnga' glog dang byi ru lta bur gsal //
T02TD3436E:94a-33: spyan gnyis yangs pa autpal sngon po 'dra zhing smin 'khyug mdzes pas brgyan gyur pa //
T02TD3436E:94a-34: ral pa mdzes shing mu tig chun pos rnam brgyan lha yi gos kyis rab mdzes pa //
T02TD3436E:94a-35: 'od zer dmar po 'phro ba'i sa bon las skyes rgyal ba phun tshogs sems can don //
T02TD3436E:94b-0: phyag ni g-yon pa padma dmar po rnam par rgyas pa rnam par bsnams gyur @94b pa ;
T02TD3436E:94b-1: / mkhas shing phyag g-yas nas ni rnam pa kun gyi mchog ni rab tu stsol bar mdzad //
T02TD3436E:94b-2: rin chen rgyan gyis rab mdzes yid rab dad pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od rab gsal //
T02TD3436E:94b-3: de nas snying gar chu skyes zla ba la //
T02TD3436E:94b-4: hr'i:yig 'od kyis yongs bskor nye bar bsam//
T02TD3436E:94b-5: snying mgrin spyi bor zla ba'i steng rnams su //
T02TD3436E:94b-6: h'um a'a:aom yig 'od 'bar myur du blta //
T02TD3436E:94b-7: de nas phyogs min padma yang dag blta //
T02TD3436E:94b-8: ban du'i kha dog phyogs bzhir rab tu rgyas //
T02TD3436E:94b-9: de steng bsil zer byed pa yongs rdzogs pa //
T02TD3436E:94b-10: gur gum lta bur rab gsal bsgom par bya //
T02TD3436E:94b-11: de la rang snying sngags kyi 'od zer ni //
T02TD3436E:94b-12: zhal nas nges 'thon zla ba bzhi yi bdag / gang la de zhugs de rnams steng du ni //
T02TD3436E:94b-13: mun pa'i tshogs 'joms nyi ma de bzhin du //
T02TD3436E:94b-14: me sogs mtshams gyur nyi ma gnas pa la //
T02TD3436E:94b-15: sa bon shin tu dkar nag dmar dang ser //
T02TD3436E:94b-16: l'am m'am de nas p'am dang t'am bzhi las //
T02TD3436E:94b-17: zla ba nyi ma yang dag sbyor bar bsam //
T02TD3436E:94b-18: de nas zla ba'i sa bon las skyes blta //
T02TD3436E:94b-19: ji ltar rang gi rten ni gzhir gyur pa //
T02TD3436E:94b-20: lha mo sna tshogs rgyan dang na bza' mchog / rin chen thor tshugs rab bcings rgyan gyis mdzes //
T02TD3436E:94b-21: me ru padma zla la spyan ma ste //
T02TD3436E:94b-22: kunda zla 'od yid 'ong phyag gnyis ma //
T02TD3436E:94b-23: bden bral padma zla la m'a ma k'i //
T02TD3436E:94b-24: brtse ldan snum bcas aindra n'i la'i mdog / rlung gi padma zla la gos dkar mo //
T02TD3436E:94b-25: chu skyes dmar po nyi ma dang mtshungs bde //
T02TD3436E:94b-26: dbang ldan padma zla la sgrol ma ste //
T02TD3436E:94b-27: gser mdog shin tu zhi ba bsgom par bya //
T02TD3436E:94b-28: de rnams pus mo sa la btsugs shing ring zhing yangs pa'i spyan //
T02TD3436E:94b-29: nu ma zung dag mtho zhing mkhregs la rked pa'i dbus cha phra //
T02TD3436E:94b-30: gus pa dang bcas rol ba'i sku smad rgyas shing yan lag mchog / skra yi 'od zer 'khyil shing 'dzum ldan thal mo rab tu sbyor //
T02TD3436E:94b-31: de nas snying ga'i sngags kyi 'od zer phreng ba yis //
T02TD3436E:94b-32: gdan drangs mdun gyi bar snang la ni bzhugs par bsam //
T02TD3436E:94b-33: dpal ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i cho ga bzhin du ni //
T02TD3436E:94b-34: rang gi 'khor los gdan drangs gzhug pa la sogs bya //
T02TD3436E:95a-1: bdag nyid rjes 'jug bum pa yis //
T02TD3436E:95a-2: dbang bskur ye shes chu yis mngon par gang bar blta //
T02TD3436E:95a-3: rgyal ba'i dbang bskur chu las rab tu skye gyur pa'i //
T02TD3436E:95a-4: kun gyi spyi bor ngag gi dbang phyug legs par bsam //
T02TD3436E:95a-5: de nas rang snying sa bon 'od zer las skyes pa'i //
T02TD3436E:95a-6: lha mo'i tshogs dang lha rnams kyis ni gang gyur te //
T02TD3436E:95a-7: dpag tu med pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs 'phro ba yis //
T02TD3436E:95a-8: rang gi 'khor lo yang ni yongs su mchod par bsgom //
T02TD3436E:95a-9: de nas snying gar zla ba dmar po yongs rdzogs la //
T02TD3436E:95a-10: 'od zer dmar po'i cha shas tshogs kyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD3436E:95a-11: shin tu dmar po'i aom h'um yi ge dbus su gnas //
T02TD3436E:95a-12: bdag gi sa bon las ni rab tu 'bar bar blta //
T02TD3436E:95a-13: rnam par 'phro ba'i 'od zer rjes 'jug kha dog tshogs //
T02TD3436E:95a-14: rgya skyegs dmar po bzhin du 'jig rten snang bar byed //
T02TD3436E:95a-15: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par dag pa'i byang chub gzung //
T02TD3436E:95a-16: sngags pas de la de bzhin so sor bsdu ba dang //
T02TD3436E:95a-17: yang dag spro dang bsdu ba'i cho ga yang yang du //
T02TD3436E:95a-18: rnam par skyo ba med pa'i yid kyis de bzhin bya //
T02TD3436E:95a-19: de dag gis ni ngal ba cher gyur gang gi tshe //
T02TD3436E:95a-20: de tshe zhal 'jug 'khor lo dang ldan sngags bzlas bya //
T02TD3436E:95a-21: nyi ma so so'i thun mtshams la //
T02TD3436E:95a-22: bsgom pa la 'bad sngags bzlas bya //
T02TD3436E:95a-23: gal te skabs ni yod gyur na //
T02TD3436E:95a-24: ji srid mngon sum mi snang bar //
T02TD3436E:95a-25: thun mtshams so sor cho ga bzhin //
T02TD3436E:95a-26: rnam dag yid gsum sngags byin brlabs //
T02TD3436E:95a-27: sngags pas mngon par bzlas pa bya //
T02TD3436E:95a-28: 'byung po kun la gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD3436E:95a-29: de nas ldang bar 'dod pa na ;
T02TD3436E:95a-30: / tshigs bcad gcig pa'i smon lam gdab //
T02TD3436E:95a-31: yang na dpal ldan klu sgrub zhabs //
T02TD3436E:95a-32: la sogs kyis mdzad mngon 'phags kyis //
T02TD3436E:95a-33: bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni //
T02TD3436E:95a-34: 'gro kun rtag tu dri med pa'i //
T02TD3436E:95a-35: dpal ldan khams gsum dbang byed nas //
T02TD3436E:95a-36: de bzhin myur du thob par shog / aom a'a:h'um zhes brjod snying gar //
T02TD3436E:95a-37: lha mo bzhi bsdu sa bon la //
T02TD3436E:95a-38: langs nas bya ba thams cad bya //
T02TD3436E:95a-39: sna tshogs pa yi don rnams dang //
T02TD3436E:95a-40: de bzhin thun mtshams bzhi yi dus rnams te //
T02TD3436E:95a-41: 'on kyang khyad par cung zad 'di yod de //
T02TD3436E:95a-42: blo yis ye shes sems dpa' gshegs nas ni //
T02TD3436E:95b-0: @95b rang gi 'khor lor ma lus bsdu bya ste //
T02TD3436E:95b-1: thun mtshams lhag ma don dam sems nyid ni //
T02TD3436E:95b-2: yang dag mngon du byas nas sngags pas nyal //
T02TD3436E:95b-3: snga ma'i dus su smon lam nus pa yis //
T02TD3436E:95b-4: rab tu sad nas de bzhin langs par bya //
T02TD3436E:95b-5: gang gis kun tu 'jig rten mgon po bsgom //
T02TD3436E:95b-6: de yis 'jigs pa che rnams rab tu zhi //
T02TD3436E:95b-7: ri dags dbang po chu dang thog srin po //
T02TD3436E:95b-8: sbrul dang me dang dgra dang 'ching ba rnams //
T02TD3436E:95b-9: gang gi rang lus 'jig rten dbang phyug blta //
T02TD3436E:95b-10: de las nyer 'phros nad dang bgegs la sogs //
T02TD3436E:95b-11: dbul dang skal ngan mi bdag gis 'dzin dang //
T02TD3436E:95b-12: dus min dus su 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang //
T02TD3436E:95b-13: gang gis thog med srid pa'i nang zhugs nas //
T02TD3436E:95b-14: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig pa rnams //
T02TD3436E:95b-15: mi shes dbang gis byas pa de rnams ni //
T02TD3436E:95b-16: gang gis 'jig rten mgon dran nyams shing zhi //
T02TD3436E:95b-17: gang gis rtag tu gus pas sgom byed na //
T02TD3436E:95b-18: ngag gi rang bzhin kun shes skye bo'i dbang //
T02TD3436E:95b-19: sngon ma mthong ba'i sgyu rtsal tshogs rnams dang //
T02TD3436E:95b-20: chung ngu la sogs yon tan brgyad rnams thob //
T02TD3436E:95b-21: gang gis 'jig rten dbang phyug sgom byed na //
T02TD3436E:95b-22: zla ba drug gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur //
T02TD3436E:95b-23: de yis zas skom stan dang padma'i sa //
T02TD3436E:95b-24: rdzas la sogs pa mchog rnams nges 'byung 'gyur //
T02TD3436E:95b-25: gang gis sngags ni yang dag bzlas byas na //
T02TD3436E:95b-26: nyes pa dang bcas thams cad spong bar 'gyur //
T02TD3436E:95b-27: yon tan thams cad yang dag skye zhing brtan //
T02TD3436E:95b-28: de phyir ngal med sems kyis sngags bzlas bya //
T02TD3436E:95b-29: dpal ldan khams gsum dbang byed 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ni yon tan gsal byed pa'i //
T02TD3436E:95b-30: bdag gis sgrub thabs zla ba'i 'od zer bgyis pa'i gang zhig bsod nams stobs kyis ni //
T02TD3436E:95b-31: de yis 'gro ba ma lus snying rje'i gzhan dbang yid kyi mun pa 'joms gyur pa'i //
T02TD3436E:95b-32: 'gro ba thams cad dbang du byed pa'i go 'phang thob cing rtag tu zhi gyur cig /'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed pa'i 'phags pa bhug ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD3436E:95b-34: // / slob dpon dpal ldan sh'u n+ya t'a sa m'a dhi badzra p'a das mdzad pa'o//
